messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] To Sandra re: flour catalog
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, Oh, I was just saying that I was looking forward to my next catalog. I get it regularly. Carly dd, trying to be helpful, decided to throw the glut of
messages.messageBody:
Sandra,
Oh, I was just saying that I was looking forward to my next catalog. I get it
regularly. Carly dd, trying to be helpful, decided to throw the glut of
overflowing catalogs into the recycle bin. There went my King Arthur's
cataIog. Now I'm just waiting for the fall edition.
My brother asked me what I wanted for my birthday. A gift certificate from
King Arthur's would suit me fine. All that wonderful bread baking that we can
do.
Hope you enjoy the return to the oasis,
Ginny



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
